TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/TrackBar/ThumbVertical extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the slider (also known as the thumb) of a vertical track bar. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbVertical class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the slider for a vertical track bar.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbVertical.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarThumbVertical1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#298](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_17_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#298](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_17_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the slider of a vertical track bar in the disabled state.
Docs.value: A that represents the slider of a vertical track bar in the disabled state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Disabled property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Disabled property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarThumbVertical5` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#302](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/034d47f0-2edd-411e-9f21-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#302](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/034d47f0-2edd-411e-9f21-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the slider of a vertical track bar that has focus.
Docs.value: A that represents the slider of a vertical track bar that has focus.

To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarThumbVertical4` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
